text: Jeotgalicoccus huakuii is a bacterium. It is gram-positive. The cells are coccoid. It tolerates salt, it is moderately halophilic. It grows in the presence of 0â€“23% sodium chloride (NaCl). Jeotgalicoccus huakuii is a facultative anaerobic bacteria: It growth under aerobic (oxygen is present) or anaerobic conditions (no oxygen is present). It belongs to the family Staphylococcaceae. ==References== Category:Gram-positive bacteria
title: Jeotgalicoccus huakuii
